FuncDef:
The emdi match-mpls-label enable command enables detection on Ps on the NG-MVPN.
The undo emdi match-mpls-label enable command disables detection on Ps on the NG-MVPN.
By default, detection on Ps on the NG-MVPN is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
On the NG-MVPN network, detection on Ps is disabled by default. To enable detection on Ps on the NG-MVPN, run the emdi match-mpls-label enable command.
